be.abeel.graphics
Interface Drawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageDrawable, JFreeChartWrapper
public interface Drawable

This interface provides the methods that should be implemented for object that can paint themselves on a graphics context within a rectangle.

Author:
Thomas Abeel

Method Summary
 void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D rec)
          Draw the object onto the graphics context within the provided rectangle.
 

Method Detail

Draw the object onto the graphics context within the provided rectangle.

Parameters:
g - the graphics context
rec - the rectangle
